SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT300
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
The MT 300 is used to: a) confirm the details of a new contract between the parties b) confirm an exercised foreign currency option c) confirm the details of an amendment to a previously sent confirmation d) cancel a previously sent confirmation. e) report to a trade repository
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporate customers, party A and party B, which have agreed to a foreign exchange contract.
This message may also be sent by a money broker to the two parties (party A and party B) for which the broker arranged the deal.
Where there are two money brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message is also exchanged between these money brokers.
This message is also used when one of the trading parties is a fund manager as the fund manager has to specify the fund for which he is dealing.
Party A and party B are the legal entities which have agreed to the transaction.
Party A is either: a) the Sender, or b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent, or c) one of the institutions for which the broker arranged the deal and to whom it is sending the confirmation, or d) when a money broker confirms to another money broker, the party for which the sending broker arranged the deal.
Party B is either: a) the Receiver, or b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is received, or c) the other institution for which the broker arranged the deal, ie, party A's counterparty, or d) when a money broker confirms to another money broker, party A's counterparty.
This message allows: a) the specification of the legal counterparties b) the inclusion of a beneficiary c) a split settlement d) the inclusion of the underlying legal agreement.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent confirmation with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 300 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 300 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent confirmation. Used to cancel an MT 300 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 300 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates a previously sent confirmation. Used to inform the Receiver that a confirmation was already sent by telex, fax or SWIFT

Code.Name: EXOP
Code.Description: Confirms the mutually agreed exercise of an option.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: Used to send a confirmation for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 300 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 300 with function CANC

Validation.Comment: One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, the Sender and the Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: The confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: If a normal trade, no MT 303 will be sent.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: If a block trade, an MT 303 will be sent by the fund manager.

Validation.Comment: One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The settlement of the amount as a whole.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The FX transaction is not PVP

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Code.Name: GBSC

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Type of Agreement must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47):

Code.Name: ISDACN
Code.Description: ISDA Master Agreement plus Additional Disruption Event Provisions for an Offshore Deliverable CNY Transaction

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 77D

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Version must be a valid year expressed as YYYY (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO

Code.Name: ABIC

Code.Name: ADD1

Code.Name: GBSC

Code.Name: NETS

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39).
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Option.Name: Y
Option.Description: Financial Nature of the Counterparty Indicator

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67)

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: The party is a financial counterparty

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The party is a non-financial counterparty

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The collateral is posted on a trade by trade basis

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The collateral is posted at a portfolio level

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The trade is not the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The trade is the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the counterparty is domiciled inside the EEA.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the counterparty is domiciled outside the EEA.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the reported trade does not fall under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the reported trade falls under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the contract is not directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the contract is directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, field 21 is mandatory if field 22A contains the code AMND or CANC."

fieldvalidation.name: C2-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 71F is not allowed in sequence C (if present), if field 94A contains one of the following codes: AGNT, BILA."

fieldvalidation.name: C2-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 71F is not allowed in sequence C (if present), if field 94A (in sequence A) is not present."

fieldvalidation.name: C2-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sequence C with field 88a is mandatory, if field 94A (in sequence A) contains the code BROK."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17U in sequence A is Y, then sequence D is mandatory; if field 17U in sequence A is N, then sequence D is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17U in sequence A is not present, then sequence D is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 77D of sequence A, if the code /VALD/ is present, then it must appear in the first six characters of the first line and in no other place, followed by a date expressed as YYYYMMDD and the end of line separator (that is :77D:/VALD/YYYYMMDDCrLf) (Error code(s): C58)."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 77D is present then, if the first six characters of the first line are /VALD/, then the second line must be present and start with /SETC/ followed by a valid ISO 4217 currency code and the end of line separator (that is /SETC/currencyCrLf). If the first six characters of the second line are /SETC/, then the first six characters of the first line must be /VALD/. The code /SETC/ is not allowed in any other place than the first six characters of the second line. If the first six characters of the third line are /SRCE/, then the first six characters of the second line must be /SETC/. The code /SRCE/ is not allowed in any other place than the first six characters of the third line (Error code(s): C59)."

fieldvalidation.name: FD-16A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 16A of sequence D, Number must equal the number of repetitions within sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-72-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 300. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 300. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-29A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 36 in sequence B, preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-1 In Subsequence B1 Amount Bought, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B1 Amount Bought, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-2 In Subsequence B2 Amount Bought, field 33B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B2 Amount Bought, field 33B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-3 In Sequence C Optional General Information, field 71F Broker's Commission, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence C Optional General Information, field 71F Broker's Commission, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-4 In Sequence D Split Settlement Details, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence D Split Settlement Details, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)"

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, field 15E may not be the only field, that is, if field 15E is present then at least one of the other fields of sequence E must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence E, when field 17Z is "Y" then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, when field 17Z is 'Y' then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56)."

fieldvalidation.name: FE-77A-ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
